S

score - Variable in class Node
Score in the game represented as an array of integers, in other words how many "coins" does each player holds in the current simulated step.
Simuation - Class in <Unnamed>
The main class that executes the whole simulation process.
Simuation() - Constructor for class Simuation
 
simulateSubTrees(Node, int, int, ArrayList<Integer[]>) - Static method in class DecisionTreeSimulation
Simulates recursion call on a new player (simulatedPlayer) that got the token passed, with lower depth (newDepth) and gets another parameter (node) to have the information to call recursion properly
simulationDecisionTree(Node, ArrayList<Integer[]>) - Static method in class DecisionTreeSimulation
Recursive method used to build a decision tree for every single step in simulation.
